# decorator

The `prompt_template` decorator for writing messages as string templates.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/decorator/index" symbolName="Awaitable" /> Awaitable

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/decorator/index" symbolName="Context" /> Context

Context for LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/decorator/index" symbolName="Message" /> Message

A message in an LLM interaction.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="prompt_templates/decorator/index" symbolName="DynamicConfig" /> DynamicConfig

Class for specifying dynamic configuration in a prompt template method.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="prompt_templates/decorator/index" symbolName="StringReturn" /> StringReturn

Protocol for a prompt template function that returns a single string.

Protocol for a context prompt template function that returns a single string.
